Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Rosemont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
